name: Scrabble
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Become the great word wizard you've always wanted to be!



Become the great SCRABBLE player you’ve always wanted to be! Like never before, you can strengthen your vocabulary, pattern recognition, and point strategies through fun and interactive training exercises. You then can apply your newfound skills in real games against your friends and family as well as our adaptable computer artificial intelligence.A personal Scrabble trainer in your hands

  • Six immersive exercises to hone your skills
  • Track your progress every step of the way
  • Three exciting game modes—Classic, Speed, and the new SCRABBLE Slam!
  • Includes a complete Merriam Webster SCRABBLE Dictionary
  • The SCRABBLE Word Finder finds the best word in any given situation
  • Play with friends and family in single- or multi-cart play
  • Six levels of computer artificial intelligence to help you raise your level of competition
